mapper.insert: INSERT INTO journal (journal_title, journal_content, journal_weather, journal_writer, journal_regdate) VALUES (#{journal_title},#{journal_content},#{journal_weather},#{journal_writer},#{journal_regdate})
mapper.update: UPDATE journal SET journal_title = #{journal_title}, journal_content = #{journal_content}, journal_weather=#{journal_weather} WHERE journal_pk = #{journal_pk}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM journal WHERE journal_pk > 0 ORDER BY journal_pk DESC
SELECT * FROM journal WHERE journal_pk > 0 ORDER BY journal_pk DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM journal WHERE journal_pk > 0
